DOC.brief_summary: This study was intended to assess the value of a hemostatic and sealing agent, a collagen sponge coated with human coagulation factors (fibrinogen and thrombin) (TachoSilÂ®), for decreasing occurrence of seroma after axillary lymphadenectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Hemostatic and Sealing Agent to Prevent Surgical Complications After Axillary Lymphadenectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients with axillary lymphadenectomies performed for oncological conditions. Patients that did not want to participate in the study.
